Visiting Tajikistan on a second official visit, Emomali Sharifovich's visit to Azerbaijan twice (cont) http://t.co/G1anWP1rMF
The Political Declaration we have signed with the President of Tajikistan determines the entire spectrum of our future relationships.
Armenia-Azerbaijan, Nagorno-Karabakh conflict, international law norms, UN Security (cont) http://t.co/kSYOAZD0jy
We are grateful to all the countries supporting this position, including Tajikistan.
Azerbaijan is actively pursuing an independent foreign policy based on its national interests, and the international (cont) http://t.co/H8aBbyGLey
We also want international organizations to lose their authority. The UN Security Council (cont) http://t.co/7HwLjdrqfw
The occupying country does not have the necessary pressure to carry out these resolutions. If you make these decisions (cont) http://t.co/d4RsDNho29
Sometimes it seems that the double standards are already the norm of international relations.
Ethnic cleansing was carried out against us, our historical, cultural and religious monuments were destroyed in the occupied territories.
These are not alienated, but live in our neighborhood, living in our land, our (cont) http://t.co/ehAnPEnEsR
Opening of the New International Sea Port, as well as the coming year (cont), which will be the largest port in the Caspian region in Azerbaijan, http://t.co/9mSpTq3yx4
This is the shortest, most cost-effective and cheapest way for Asia to Europe and vice versa.
Restoration of direct flight between Dushanbe and Baku is great for our countries closer (cont) http://t.co/haJC9mqtnX
The people of Tajikistan and Azerbaijan are close to each other in terms of history and culture.
It unites us with commonality of our culture, common civilization, common history.
We will also hold various cultural events in the future.
There is a very positive dynamics in Tajikistan and Azerbaijan, stability is ensured, and economic and social issues are solved.
There are no internal threats to our security in our countries. All the factors that disturb us are beyond our borders.
Therefore, the strengthening of our borders, as well as our contribution to regional security, are actively discussed.
We also support each other in international organizations and we vote for each other's initiatives.
When we nominate our candidacy for the non-permanent membership of the UN Security Council, Tajikistan is actively involved in Azerbaijan (cont) http://t.co/Ki1CanABYN
We are open to the whole world and cooperate with the whole world.
Azerbaijan is doing much in the field of dialogue of civilizations and intercultural dialogue.
The Baku Humanitarian Forum, which is regularly held for the fourth time ever, is dedicated to issues related to multiculturalism.
The basis of our state and the future of our success are our commitment to the traditional values ​​of our people.
We must keep these values ​​and reinforce them.
The new, younger generation must also be dependent on their country, their own people, love the homeland and be brought up in the national spirit.
We strive to be in good relations with neighbors and we help them within our power.
If we need help, we look forward to help from our neighbors, and we see an adequate attitude.
Education, science investment is the basis for further development.
Not the energy resources that determine the success of the country, but its intellectual potential.
We must also be among the developed countries with strong scientific potential.
